sec.div: 3.7. MPEO Restored CYP2E1 Expression in CCl 4-Induced Liver Fibrosis
sec.p: Quantitative RT-PCR analysis showed a significant decrease in CYP2E1 mRNA in the liver fibrosis control group to 27% of that of the control group. MPOE-treated rats in group 3 showed marked increase in mRNA level to +2.32-folds of the normal level ( Figure 8(b)).
